alert.note: Alert for Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 3:43PM EST until March 08 at 8:30PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Black River At Elyria affecting Lorain County. For the Black River...including Elyria...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River At Elyria. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Flooding begins south of Elyria in Carlisle Township along Woodside Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 9.9 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight by 145 AM EST.
